credit_line: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
title: Figure studies
provenance: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
medium: black crayon on slamon pink paper
description: Horizontal rectangle. Studies of the figure of a young girl. Above, left: hand holding a flower; above, right: bust-length study seen from the back. Below left: three-quarter length study facing left, holding a vessel containing flowers in her hands.
name: Drawing
